With this information, I've created a sample schedule for you that incorporates your soccer games, tennis lessons, running routine, and rest days. Feel free to adjust it as needed to suit your specific needs and preferences.

**Monday:**

* Morning run (30-40 minutes, moderate pace)

**Tuesday:**

* Morning run (30-40 minutes, moderate pace)

**Wednesday:**

* Tennis lesson (6 pm)
* Rest of the day: active recovery (e.g., light stretching, yoga, or a leisurely walk)

**Thursday:**

* Morning run (30-40 minutes, moderate pace)

**Friday:**

* Rest day or active recovery

**Saturday:**

* Longer run (45-60 minutes, moderate to challenging pace)

**Sunday:**

* Soccer game (9 am - 11 am)
* Rest of the day: active recovery or relaxation

This schedule allows for:

* 3-4 runs per week, with one longer run on the weekends to help increase your endurance
* One tennis lesson per week on Wednesdays
* At least one or two rest days per week (Friday and/or Sunday afternoon)
* Your Sunday morning soccer games

Remember to:

* Warm up before each run and soccer game with light stretching and dynamic movements
* Cool down after each run and soccer game with static stretches
* Listen to your body and adjust the intensity and duration of your runs based on how you feel
* Incorporate proper nutrition, hydration, and sleep to support your exercise routine

Feel free to adjust this schedule as needed, and don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need further modifications!
